detail_desc: Short T-shirt dress in soft jersey with short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Blouse in an airy, crinkled weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, long, wide puff sleeves and cuffs with covered buttons. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.

Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow shoulder strap and one inner compartment. Flap with a concealed magnetic fastener and decorative tab with a metal fastener. Lined. Size 6x17.5x20 cm.

Jumpsuit in a sturdy viscose weave with a sheen. Notch lapels, V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the top and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist and a concealed zip in one side.
Metal rings in various designs.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a roll-edge neckline, sewn on bow at the front, button on one shoulder and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric.
WILLIAM MORRIS & CO. x H&M. Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a soft cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Large, block-coloured scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidered detail on the chest and short sleeves with narrow ribbed trims. Slits at the hem.
Short-sleeved, fitted jersey top with a slightly deeper neckline.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with terry inside.
Block-coloured top in sweatshirt fabric with a text print on the front, a stand-up collar, zip at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in a linen and cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Short, fitted lace dress with long sleeves, cut-out section at the back and button at the back of the neck. Contrasting colour lining.
Small weekend bag in woven fabric with a zip and two handles at the top, an adjustable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 12x35x42 cm.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with wide, elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Brushed inside.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reflective details. Detachable hood, zip down the front, fleece-lined front pockets and inner ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs. Brushed fleece inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a motif at the top, a detachable, jersey-lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in jersey containing glittery threads with a V-neck front and back, a concealed press-stud at the front and narrow, elastic shoulder straps. Elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Joggers in washed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and tapered legs with decorative stitching at the knees and ribbed hems.
Sun hat in a cotton weave with ties under the chin. Lined. Width of brim 4.5 cm.
All-in-one suit in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems, and press-studs on one shoulder, at the crotch and down the legs. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut sports top in fast-drying mesh with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Rectangular sunglasses with plastic and metal frames, thin sidepieces, adjustable nose pads and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cropped, wide T-shirt in cotton jersey with a drawstring at the hem. Ribbed neckline and dropped shoulders.
Sun visor in braided paper straw with a sweatband in woven fabric. Sewn-on ears at the top, embroidery on the visor and a hook and loop fastening at the back.
Jumper in a soft textured cotton knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and small, sewn-on imitation leather label at the hem.
Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and shorts with an elasticated waist.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Ribbed polo-neck jumper in a soft mohair blend in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut single-breasted jacket in a crêpe weave with notch lapels and long sleeves with slits at the cuffs. Unlined.

Cropped, off-the-shoulder blouse in soft cotton seersucker with elastication and a frill trim at the top. Short puff sleeves with pin-tucks, inset embroidery and narrow elastication at the hems. Elastication and a flounced trim at the hem.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round neckline, gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.
Long-sleeved body in lace and mesh with a V-neck, mesh side sections and press-studs at the crotch. Lined bust.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Court shoes with pointed toes. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Mesh-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and elasticated cuffs. Mesh lining.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Treggings in stretch imitation leather with an elasticated waist and seams on the legs. Soft inside.
High-waisted, block-coloured jeans in soft, superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Shirt in a washed linen and cotton blend with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Imitation leather biker jacket with quilted details on the shoulders, press-studs on the lapels and a diagonal zip. Zipped chest pocket, zipped side pockets, a small flap pocket with a press-stud, an inner pocket, and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.

Knee-length padded parka in woven fabric with a pile-lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a drawstring at the waist. One zipped chest pocket, flap side pockets with press-studs, an adjustable tab and press-stud at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Quilted lining.
Long-sleeved dresses in soft organic cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and gently flared skirt.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed cotton jersey with overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.

Lightweight gilet in nylon with a filling of 70% recycled down and 30% recycled feathers. Small stand-up collar that can be folded in and secured with a press-stud to form a V-neck. Press-studs down the front and side pockets. The gilet is easy to pack into the storage bag it is supplied with. Size of storage bag 10x22 cm.

Long, warm-lined jacket in washed cotton denim with a faux shearling collar and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap front pockets with a button, an open chest pocket and side pockets. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Short, wrapover skirt in a soft jacquard weave with a contrasting colour pattern with raw edges. Tab and metal rings at one side and an inner button. Unlined.
Outdoor jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a gathered seam under the bust for added width and soft draping.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and wide legs.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and a seam and flounce at the hem.
Two pairs of fully lined bikini bottoms, one with an all-over print and a frill-trim at the top.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with moulded, lightly padded cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Felted wool beret. Unlined.
Sleeveless blouse in airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pocket. Yoke at the back, and tie-front hem. Longer at the back.
Trousers in slightly stretchy cotton twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets with a button and tapered legs. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces.

Dress with a matching hairband in soft organic cotton. Sleeveless dress with buttons on the shoulders and a sewn-in bodysuit with elasticated hems and press-studs at the crotch. Hairband with a sewn-in knot at the front and covered elastic at the back of the neck.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover funnel collar, kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Boys' briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined crotch.
Top in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover front and back and narrow ties at the back of the neck. Seam under the bust with elastication at the back, and short, wide sleeves.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Scarf in soft, fine-knit cashmere with wide ribbed trims on the short sides. Size 48x200 cm.

Waist belt in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with a round metal buckle and a matching, detachable pouch with a flap and metal ring closure. Lined. Width of belt approx. 2.5 cm. Size of bag approx 2.5x11.5x17 cm.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with lace details, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long skirt in airy chiffon with a high, elasticated waist and high slits in the sides. Short jersey underskirt.

Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Leggings in a stretch cotton blend with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
5-pocket jeans in washed, supersoft stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Straight-style, long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with print motifs front, back and on the sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Wide blouse in an airy weave with a gathered grandad collar, buttons down the front and long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck and straight-cut hem.

Coat in woven fabric made from a felted wool blend with a stand-up collar and buttons at the front. Diagonal, welt side pockets, two inner pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Short, fitted dress in stretch jersey with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a wrapover front with a drawstring at one side. Unlined.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
